data.title: Online Book by Ayn Rand Author
data.meta_description: Read aloud Anthem by Ayn Rand Author (ISBN:GB00000001249), LightSail is the most complete & adaptive language arts platform. Homeschooling for the twenty-first century.
data.text:
LightSail Education has several active social media & other communities online including, but not limited to, Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, LinkedIn, and Blog pages. We would love for you to follow us on these platforms and join our ongoing discussion about literacy and lifelong learners, along with your experiences with LightSail.

By posting on any LightSail Education Social Media Page or associated page, you agree to these terms:

The purposes of our social media pages is to encourage and support parents and children in their pursuit of literacy along with a free exchange of ideas and commentary regarding the topics we choose to post, including print, video, and multimedia images. By accessing, viewing, and posting any content to any LightSail Education site on the internet, you accept, without limitation or qualification, the follow terms of use as well as the terms of use by the specific company that owns and operates the social media site (i.e. Facebook, YouTube, etc.). If you do not agree, do not post. By posting, you indicate your agreement to comply with our terms and conditions in the same manner as if you had personally signed a document.

When posting on LightSail's social media, please adhere to these guidelines. We reserve the right to remove any content that violates our guidelines, including but not limited to:

No violation of another's copyright or intellectual property.

No disruptive or excessively repetitive posts, including the use of a bot for spam posting or messaging.

No posting any material in any manner that is abusive, disparaging, disruptive, defamatory, embarrassing, harassing, libelous, obscene, or invades another's privacy.

No hateful, offensive, inflammatory, or racially, ethnically, or otherwise objectionable material as solely determined by LightSail Education's staff, including that which may directly attack or accuse another person.

No confidential, nonpublic, proprietary, or sensitive information you do not want the public to see.

No links or content containing viruses, malware, or spyware of any kind.

No purporting to act as a representative or spokesperson for LightSail Education.

No posting under another's identity.

No promotional posts from another company or product without direct approval from LightSail Education.

No off-topic commentary or redundancy.

Comments posted on any of our social media platforms, including but not limited to images, videos, and text, indicates that you grant LightSail Education the unrestricted, nonexclusive, royalty-free, perpetual, irrevocable, and fully sublicensable right to adapt, create derivative works from, display, modify, publish, reproduce, and/or translate such material throughout the world in any of our media without providing attribution or obtaining consent. You also agree that LightSail Education and its affiliates are free to use any and all concepts, ideas, and/or information you provide via websites, social media, or other online avenues.
